pageProps.content:
Experience

La Cle des Montagne offers luxurious villa-style living in the heart of the Franschhoek valley in the Cape Winelands District.
Sophisticated, stylish & breathtakingly beautiful – these opulent villas & suites are located on a working wine estate, surrounded by picturesque vineyards, plum orchards & spectacular mountains.
La Cle is the ideal destination for the discerning traveller who is after an intimate & luxurious villa experience. The villas offer an idyllic setting a short stroll from the historic village of Franschhoek, with its award-winning restaurants, cafes & art galleries.

Stay

Consisting of 2 properties in 2 different locations, La Cle gives guests the choice of staying at The Village or The Lodge.
The Village is home to 4 villas (Grange, Manoir, Galerie & Colonial), while The Lodge is split into 5 rooms, boasting captivating views of the Franschhoek Valley.
Guests can book all accommodation on a per-room or exclusive-use basis (apart from the Galerie villa, which can only be booked exclusively.)
Each of The Village’s 4 elegant villas has been individually styled & comes complete with an interactive kitchen, a lounge & dining room as well as an outdoor deck area with a swimming pool.
La Cle Lodge offers expansive views, a tennis court, putt & chip lawn & helipad.

Activities

The Winelands can keep one busy for a few days!
Activities include cheese & wine tasting tours, horse riding, hiking & visits to the beautiful town of Stellenbosch, only a 20-minute drive away.
A highlight is taking a stroll through the charming village of Franschhoek with its many award-winning restaurants, shops & art galleries.

subfolders.title: Babylonstoren
subfolders.description: Babylonstoren is everything but ordinary.  One of the oldest Cape Dutch farms, this elegant home offers a simplistic, yet luxurious farm-style experience.   So much more than just a farm, Babylonstoren loves to provide their guests with a personal, authentic – yet luxurious stay by allowing guests to get involved in some exciting farm activities, like fruit picking in season or tasting food prepared fresh from their garden.

subfolders.title: Bonne Esperance
subfolders.description: With a prestigious setting in the heart of the historical town of Stellenbosch, lies Bonne Esperance, an award-winning boutique hotel & one of the Winelands’ best-kept secrets. Stellenbosch is known for its majestic mountains, opulent vineyards, fascinating art & culture as well as its world-class gastronomy & wine.

subfolders.title: Clouds Estate
subfolders.description: Clouds Estate, as the name suggests, is set high on the Helshoogte Mountain pass, enjoying spectacular views over the Stellenbosch valley below.   This Winelands estate boasts an excellent location close to the charming town of Stellenbosch & the beautiful Franschhoek village.

subfolders.title: Delaire Graff Estate
subfolders.description: Delaire Graff Estate is ideally located on the Helshoogte Mountain pass overlooking the Stellenbosch valley.  This prestigious estate boasts luxurious suites with private decks & pools, stylish interiors & contemporary décor. Without a doubt, one of the top wine estates in South Africa, Delaire Graff never fails to impress.  It made has won numerous awards & is a proud member of the luxurious group, Relais & Chateaux.

subfolders.title: Franschhoek Country House
subfolders.description: Located on the outskirts of the charming village of Franschhoek, the luxurious Franschhoek Country House & Villas offer sublime cuisine & fine South African wines.   An ideal base from which to explore the Winelands, this country house’s elegant suites & villas will take you back in time to an era of romance & sophistication.

subfolders.title: Grand Dedale Country House
subfolders.description: The scenic & secluded Grand Dedale Country House is set along a dirt road at the foot of the Bainskloof Pass on Doolhof, a working wine estate close to the Winelands town of Wellington. This elegant retreat is surrounded by mountains & forests, offering guests a rural elegance a mere hour’s drive from the vibrant city of Cape Town.

subfolders.title: Grande Roche
subfolders.description: Nestled at the foot of the magnificent Paarl Rock, is a boutique hotel like no other.  Grande Roche is a celebrated historical monument turned 5-star hotel, boasting beautiful gardens & excellent cuisine. With spectacular views over endless vineyards & mountains, Grande Roche offers guests a scenic & secluded Winelands experience.

subfolders.title: La Cle des Montagnes
subfolders.description: La Cle des Montagne offers luxurious villa-style living in the heart of the Franschhoek valley in the Cape Winelands District.   Sophisticated, stylish & breathtakingly beautiful – these opulent villas & suites are located on a working wine estate, surrounded by picturesque vineyards, plum orchards & spectacular mountains.

subfolders.title: La Residence
subfolders.description: Situated on a private wine & olive estate in the picturesque Franschhoek valley, lies La Residence – an opulent French-inspired residence with beautifully designed suites, generous dining, private butler, chef & chauffeur services. The award-winning La Residence estate overlooks a spectacular mountain range & is surrounded by lush vineyards, the idyllic location to appreciate some of Franschhoek’s most beautiful scenery.

subfolders.title: Lanzerac Hotel & Spa
subfolders.description: The Lanzerac Hotel & Spa is nestled in the leafy & tranquil Winelands neighbourhood of Stellenbosch, one of South Africa’s gourmet food capitals. The hotel is set on a 155-hectare working wine estate where endless views of rolling vineyards & majestic mountains are an everyday occurrence.

subfolders.title: Le Franschhoek Hotel & Spa
subfolders.description: Le Franschhoek Hotel & Spa boasts a scenic setting on a mountain-side estate in the stunning Franschhoek valley – the heartbeat of the Cape Winelands. This Alpine-style region is located only an hour’s drive from the vibrant city of Cape Town, making Le Franschhoek an ideal choice for a classic Winelands experience.

subfolders.title: Le Quartier Francais
subfolders.description: Le Quartier Francais is set within beautiful gardens in the heart of Franschhoek – the very heartbeat of the Cape Winelands & the gourmet capital of South Africa. This charming & luxurious boutique hotel is centrally located on the village’s main street & within walking distance to many shops, boutiques, galleries & restaurants.

subfolders.title: Leeu Estates
subfolders.description: Leeu Estates Franschhoek is set on 100 hectares of vineyards, landscaped gardens & fynbos within the heart of the Cape Winelands – the culinary capital of the country. Tucked away between the mountainside & river, just minutes away from the village of Franschhoek, Leeu Estates is the ideal setting for an elegant & sophisticated hideaway.

subfolders.title: Leeu House
subfolders.description: Leeu House is an exclusive 5-star boutique hotel boasting an idyllic setting in the heart of the scenic Franschhoek valley: South Africa’s best culinary destination. This sophisticated & private hideaway offers superb comfort, individually-styled rooms & exceptional service.

subfolders.title: Light House Boutique Suites
subfolders.description: The Light House Boutique Suites is a privately owned, exclusive & opulent boutique guest house set in the heart of the historic town of Paarl in the Cape Winelands.   Here, guests will be able to enjoy warm, professional & friendly hospitality, superb wines & delicious cuisine.

whatWeLoveItems: Luxurious villas & suites set on a working wine estate
Swimming pool, tennis court & croquet lawn
A short stroll from the idyllic Franschhoek village
Ideal for families or exclusive-use stays
